string-array.name: gender
string-array.item: Male
Female

string-array.name: q1
string-array.item: Fitness Pal, with multiple health monitoring areas, helps fitness enthusiasts track, monitor, alter and fulfill fitness practices and goals to achieve their desired health benefits.

string-array.name: q2
string-array.item: The Company takes reasonable steps to protect your personal information, however, you accept that no digital data source can be guaranteed to be secure from access by unintended recipients and will not hold us responsible for any breach of security should one occur.

string-array.name: q3
string-array.item: This app is owned and operated by Noodles Group trading as Fitness Pal. Fitness Pal is an online matching, payment and booking marketplace that connects Fitness Professionals and Clients who are looking for on-demand access to Exercise Services.

string-array.name: q4
string-array.item: Noodles are a group of 5 CS students who are creating their Group Project for MAD course.

string-array.name: day1Normal
string-array.item:
12/10/8 Barbell Shrug
12/10/8 Dumbbell Raise
3x8 Deadlift
12/10/8 Bent Over-Rows
3 x until failure Pull-Ups

string-array.name: day2Normal
string-array.item:
12/10/8/6 Bench Press
12/10/10/8 Pec Flys
12/10/8/6 Incline Bench
12/10/10/8 Decline Dumbbell Bench Press

string-array.name: day3Normal
string-array.item:
12/10/8 Barbell Squat
12/10/8 Leg Extension
12/10/8 Dumbbell Lunges
12/10/8 Front Squats

string-array.name: day4Normal
string-array.item:
12/10/8/6 Military Press
12/10/10/8 EZ Bar Bicep Curls
12/10/8 Overhead Tricep Extensions
3 x until failure Chin-Ups

string-array.name: day5Normal
string-array.item: 45 mins treadmills
